channel.title: ActiveSync on PetterTech
channel.description: Recent content in ActiveSync on PetterTech

item.title: Activesync issue on Exchange 2010
item.description: At work we are currently migrating to a new active directory domain. The migration hos gone rather smoothly except for a couple of users who are not able to sync mail on their phones. After a little research I found the following events in the event log on our exchange CAS server: Log Name: Application Source: MSExchange ActiveSync Date: 04.08.2011 11:00:48 Event ID: 1053 Task Category: Configuration Level: Error Keywords: Classic
